attributes.review: i got this app to be more educated on what’s going on in the 2020 presidential race. but as soon as i opened the app i saw an ugly oompah loompa lookin orange cheeto man 🤢🤢 and then to make it even worse an american flag 🤢🤢 ... this app has no drip, no splaa, no sauce, no flavor, no spice. if i could compare it to something i’d say the first slice of bread that nobody eats 💀. it’s just disgusting. then it said “keep america great” 🤦🏽‍♀️ since when has america been great.. it kinda just went downhill in 2017. anyways i don’t recommend the app.
attributes.title: you tried 😙🦋💓🧚🏼 but don’t try again 😖🤢😐

attributes.review: I rate it a 1 because i was so happy to support our Cheeto looking president but then I opened the app and saw him and it gave me nightmares and also our lovely president is racist sexist and a lot of more different bad things so yeah currently I’m still having nightmares and yeah so please do me a favor and ban the app thank u bye🥰
attributes.title: Ban this app✨

attributes.review: This app is the worst when I opened it I saw the ugliest thing ever I needed to bleach my eyes and the things written there that apparently are for our county is garbage made me throw up and head hurt bc it just won’t work bc it’s that bad like dang didn’t know something could be so bad.
attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼‍♀️This the worst app ever🧚🏼‍♀️✨

attributes.review: Just because a app gets deleted doesn’t mean he is going to lose it just means ur salty
attributes.title: TRUMP 2020

attributes.review: At first I thought this would be a nice app since our president is so freaking rich he must have a good app correct. Well I was wrong this app sucked so much o could not even read the words. It is such a undeveloped app and the devs did not try to make this a nice app at all.
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: It was an awful experience having this app. I’m probably going to end up deleting it. It felt spammy, out of touch, & was sadly really annoying. I thought it would be informative & quick, but it’s so bad!!! Never use this app!!!!
attributes.title: Not what I was hoping for

attributes.review: The app is terrible and slow and inconvenient. Taking away tik tok from us just makes this app much worse all together. If you take away tik tok your taking away someone’s source of happiness and someone could die from being sad. Anyways yeah this app is bad delete it.
attributes.title: Tik tok

attributes.review: I’ve never been so upset with this app! It makes you sign up for some text messaging service and they just SPAM YOU WITH MESSAGES ALL THE TIME!!!! I’m so angry with the developers of the app for sending me the dumbest campaigns ever! I will never be downloading or spending my money on this ever again!!!! 🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: This app is terrible!

attributes.review: No just no this app gets 1 star cause as soon as i opened it i got a picture of a orange 🍊 on my screen and it scared me. this app also wants my information to track me but i said no cuz i dont want to get tracked by this app so instead i deleted the app but anyways stan gen z for clear skin☺️💅
attributes.title: it made me uncomfy🥰

attributes.review: This guy is a racist and homophobic and disgusting child who approves of Muslim concentration camps and thinks Venezuela is part of the US, he has no intention of trying to get the country to come together and be peaceful, he is filled with hate and has told more lies than any other president while in office. No thank you
